results.name: Beaver Fever (Zbordek, Zvr8888, Makku3d, katieross, Wolven)
The Last Seed (Aalto University - Game Design)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960 or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64-bit Pop-OS or Equivalent
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Codec for mp4 videos is needed to watch the game intro.
